text: <@U7SL518D6> I think the feature missing here is working with real content that ends up on the production site. A way to copy the data and tweaks from live website pages to the development environment would be amazing

We’re actively working on a few things to address this.

In the mean time if you’re working on a redesign or significant update to templates/modules you can use Content Staging to stage your live pages and then swap templates of those pages to the new redesigned templates and modules. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/content-staging>

That way you can work with real data in a safe environment.

<@U024DGMG1S7>, i would suggest posting this question in the HubSpot community forums.  possibly <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CRM/bd-p/sales_CRM|here>
people like <@UM5JQ5EUE> might be able to help there :grin:
